title: Pet That Dog!
description:
Twelve-year-old Gideon Kidd is an expert dog-petter. He’s pet over a thousand dogs, but don’t get jealous — he’s sharing all of his pets, and his wisdom, with the world.

Follow I’ve Pet That Dog on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and online

Pre-order Gideon's book, “Pet That Dog! A Handbook for Making Four-Legged Friends,” here

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Learn more about your dog with Embark. Use promo code SMILE for 15% off!

Upgrade your hard seltzer with Vizzy - vizzyhardseltzer.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
